page.title: 08Mousehole Bird Hospital
page.content: {Mousehole}has had a{Bird Hospital and Sanctuary since 1928 when it was founded by the Misses D. and P. Yglesias. The aim of the hospital is to accept any{bird}in need of care, to heal them and return them to the wild. If the latter is not possible then the birds are provided with sanctuary for the rest of their lives. Although any bird in need is accepted into care, and some rare species that have been blown off course over the Atlantic have been cared for, it is mostly sea birds that are catered for. Many of these suffer from the effects of oil which has been dumped at sea by oil{tankers}cleaning their tanks, this is then picked up on the birds feathers and then enters the their stomachs in their attempts to clean themselves.
